title: Sync package documentation enhancement on WaitGroups
body:
by **leimy2k**: 
The documentation for the Add function on WaitGroups says the following:

==========
func (wg *WaitGroup) Add(delta int)

Add adds delta, which may be negative, to the WaitGroup counter. If the counter becomes
zero, all goroutines blocked on Wait() are released.
==========

It does not mention that causing the WaitGroup's counter to go negative will cause a
panic, yet that's what happens per the implementation.
